00048 struct
00049 {
00050       PARSE_STAGE curElement;
00051 
00052       INT8        szCharData[MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH+1];
00053       ARMOURTYPE        curArmour;
00054       ARMOURTYPE *      curArray;
00055       UINT32                  maxArraySize;
00056       
00057       UINT32                  currentDepth;
00058       UINT32                  maxReadDepth;
00059 }
00060 typedef armourParseData;
00061 
00062 static void XMLCALL 
00063 armourStartElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name, const char **atts)
00064 {
00065       armourParseData * pData = (armourParseData *)userData;
00066 
00067       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //are we reading this element?
00068       {
00069             if(strcmp(name, "ARMOURLIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_NONE)
00070             {
00071                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00072 
00073                   memset(pData->curArray,0,sizeof(ARMOURTYPE)*pData->maxArraySize);
00074 
00075                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00076             }
00077             else if(strcmp(name, "ARMOUR") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_LIST)
00078             {
00079                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00080 
00081                   memset(&pData->curArmour,0,sizeof(ARMOURTYPE));
00082 
00083                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00084             }
00085             else if(pData->curElement == ELEMENT &&
00086                         (strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0 ||
00087                         strcmp(name, "ubArmourClass") == 0 ||
00088                         strcmp(name, "ubProtection") == 0 ||
00089                         strcmp(name, "ubDegradePercent") == 0 ))
00090             {
00091                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_PROPERTY;
00092 
00093                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00094             }
00095 
00096             pData->szCharData[0] = '\0';
00097       }
00098 
00099       pData->currentDepth++;
00100 
00101 }
00102 
00103 static void XMLCALL
00104 armourCharacterDataHandle(void *userData, const char *str, int len)
00105 {
00106       armourParseData * pData = (armourParseData *)userData;
00107 
00108       if( (pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) && 
00109             (strlen(pData->szCharData) < MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH)
00110         ){
00111             strncat(pData->szCharData,str,__min((unsigned int)len,MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH-strlen(pData->szCharData)));
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 static void XMLCALL
00117 armourEndElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name)
00118 {
00119       armourParseData * pData = (armourParseData *)userData;
00120 
00121       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //we're at the end of an element that we've been reading
00122       {
00123             if(strcmp(name, "ARMOURLIST") == 0)
00124             {
00125                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_NONE;
00126             }
00127             else if(strcmp(name, "ARMOUR") == 0)
00128             {
00129                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00130 
00131                   if(pData->curArmour.uiIndex < pData->maxArraySize)
00132                   {
00133                         pData->curArray[pData->curArmour.uiIndex] = pData->curArmour; //write the armour into the table
00134                   }
00135             }
00136             else if(strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0)
00137             {
00138                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00139                   pData->curArmour.uiIndex   = (UINT32) atol(pData->szCharData);
00140             }
00141             else if(strcmp(name, "ubArmourClass") == 0)
00142             {
00143                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00144                   pData->curArmour.ubArmourClass  = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00145             }
00146             else if(strcmp(name, "ubProtection") == 0)
00147             {
00148                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00149                   pData->curArmour.ubProtection = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00150             }
00151             else if(strcmp(name, "ubDegradePercent") == 0)
00152             {
00153                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00154                   pData->curArmour.ubDegradePercent   = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00155             }
00156 
00157             pData->maxReadDepth--;
00158       }
00159 
00160       pData->currentDepth--;
00161 }

00166 BOOLEAN ReadInArmourStats(STR fileName)
00167 {
00168       HWFILE            hFile;
00169       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00170       UINT32            uiFSize;
00171       CHAR8 *           lpcBuffer;
00172       XML_Parser  parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00173       
00174       armourParseData pData;
00175 
00176       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Loading Armours.xml" );
00177 
00178       // Open armour file
00179       hFile = FileOpen( fileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00180       if ( !hFile )
00181             return( FALSE );
00182       
00183       uiFSize = FileGetSize(hFile);
00184       lpcBuffer = (CHAR8 *) MemAlloc(uiFSize+1);
00185 
00186       //Read in block
00187       if ( !FileRead( hFile, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, &uiBytesRead ) )
00188       {
00189             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00190             return( FALSE );
00191       }
00192 
00193       lpcBuffer[uiFSize] = 0; //add a null terminator
00194 
00195       FileClose( hFile );
00196 
00197       
00198       XML_SetElementHandler(parser, armourStartElementHandle, armourEndElementHandle);
00199       XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, armourCharacterDataHandle);
00200 
00201       
00202       memset(&pData,0,sizeof(pData));
00203       pData.curArray = Armour;
00204       pData.maxArraySize = MAXITEMS; 
00205       
00206       XML_SetUserData(parser, &pData);
00207 
00208 
00209     if(!XML_Parse(parser, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, TRUE))
00210       {
00211             CHAR8 errorBuf[511];
00212 
00213             sprintf(errorBuf, "XML Parser Error in Armours.xml: %s at line %d", XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)), XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser));
00214             LiveMessage(errorBuf);
00215 
00216             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00217             return FALSE;
00218       }
00219 
00220       MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00221 
00222 
00223       XML_ParserFree(parser);
00224 
00225 
00226       return( TRUE );
00227 }
00228 BOOLEAN WriteArmourStats()
00229 {
00230       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"writearmourstats");
00231       HWFILE            hFile;
00232 
00233       //Debug code; make sure that what we got from the file is the same as what's there
00234       // Open a new file
00235       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\Armour out.xml", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00236       if ( !hFile )
00237             return( FALSE );
00238       
00239       {
00240             UINT32 cnt;
00241 
00242             FilePrintf(hFile,"<ARMOURLIST>\r\n");
00243             for(cnt = 0;cnt < MAXITEMS;cnt++)
00244             {
00245 
00246                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<ARMOUR>\r\n");
00247 
00248                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<uiIndex>%d</uiIndex>\r\n",                                               cnt );
00249                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubArmourClass>%d</ubArmourClass>\r\n",                                               Armour[cnt].ubArmourClass  );
00250                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubProtection>%d</ubProtection>\r\n",                                           Armour[cnt].ubProtection   );
00251                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubDegradePercent>%d</ubDegradePercent>\r\n",                                               Armour[cnt].ubDegradePercent   );
00252 
00253                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</ARMOUR>\r\n");
00254             }
00255             FilePrintf(hFile,"</ARMOURLIST>\r\n");
00256       }
00257       FileClose( hFile );
00258 
00259       return( TRUE );
00260 }
